<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/campaigns/{campaign_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update a campaign

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":true,"description":"Bearer token","schema":{"type":"string","example":"Bearer <api-key>"}},{"name":"campaign_id","in":"path","required":true,"description":"ID of the campaign to update.","schema":{"type":"integer"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":false,"content":{"multipart/form-data":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"domain_id":{"type":"integer"},"name":{"type":"string"},"domain":{"type":"string"},"branding_name":{"type":"string"},"branding_url":{"type":"string"},"email_reports":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"integer"}},"is_enabled":{"type":"boolean"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Campaign updated successfully","content":{"application/json":{"example":{"data":{"id":1}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
